name: Dungeon Rogue (FrostPunchInteractive)
description:
Find the princess in this shoot 'em up hardcore pixel dungeon!

INSTRUCTIONS

  • W,A,S,D -> Movement
  • Left click -> Fire

This game is made for "Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1". All of the code belongs to me. Most of the art also belongs to me.

Follow me on:  https://twitter.com/Frostpunch_ia
